title: Gilani expresses sorrow over loss of lives in Motorway bus accident
content:
ISLAMABAD, Dec 30 (APP): Chairman Senate Syed Yousaf Raza Gilani on Monday expressed profound grief over the tragic loss of lives in a passenger bus accident near Fateh Jang on the Motorway.
In his condolence message, he extended heartfelt sympathies to the bereaved families and prayed for the forgiveness and elevation of ranks for those who lost their lives.
He also prayed for the speedy recovery of the injured and urged the relevant authorities to provide the best possible medical care for them.
The Chairman stressed the need for implementing effective preventive measures to avoid such unfortunate incidents in the future.
He was of the that proper safety strategies and precautions could help avert similar tragedies.
“We stand in solidarity with the grieving families of those who lost their lives in this devastating accident. May Allah grant them patience and strength to bear this immense loss,” he said.
He also prayed for the bereaved families, wishing them courage and fortitude during this difficult time.
